execute(bytes,uint256).details: Payable in case excess bera required to satisfy withdraw precompile fee

params.amount: The amount of funds to withdraw from validator
params.pubkey: The pubkey to withdraw validator funds from

process().details: Reverts if balance has not increased by full amount of request for next-to-process request nonce

params.amount: The amount of funds to withdraw
params.receiver: The address to receive withdrawn funds

returns.nonce: The nonce created when queueing the withdraw

params.nonce: The nonce associated with the claim

returns.amountProcess: The amount of bera left to be processed for withdraw request
returns.amountSubmit: The amount of bera left to be submitted for withdraw request
returns.fee: The fee escrow amount set aside for withdraw precompile request
returns.receiver: The address of the receiver of bera funds to be claimed
returns.timestamp: The block.timestamp at which withdraw request was issued

execute(bytes,uint256).notice: Executes a withdraw request to withdraw precompile

fees().notice: Amount of BERA internally set aside for withdraw precompile request fees

nonceProcess().notice: The next nonce in queue to process claims for

nonceRequest().notice: The next nonce to issue withdraw request for

nonceSubmit().notice: The next nonce to submit withdraw request for

process().notice: Processes the funds received from withdraw precompile to next-to-process request receiver

queue(address,uint256).notice: Queues a withdraw from InfraredBERA for chain withdraw precompile escrowing minimum fees for request to withdraw precompile

rebalancing().notice: Amount of BERA internally rebalancing amongst Infrared validators

requests(uint256).notice: Outstanding requests for claims on previously burnt ibera

reserves().notice: Amount of BERA internally set aside to process withdraw compile requests from funds received on successful requests

sweep(bytes).notice: Sweeps forced withdrawals to InfraredBERA to re-stake principal
